channel.title: How do i edit my server?
channel.description: i need help on editing my server how do i edit it ? it is phonescpae and i was wondering how i can change it to say ploxscape instead of phonescpae in the game like "welcome to ploxscape"instead of phonescpae plz help :confused:

item.title: How do i edit my server?
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Just be sure to compile it first, I had this issue when I first started with mopar. I had come straight from perl and was not used to compiling languages.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit my server?

item.title: How do i edit my server?
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

[quote=“tom_ownz, post:2, topic:108406”]go to client.java and search for " welcome to phonescape " and then change that to what ever you want

i hope i helped…[/quote]

As above, after that. Save it, then compile it, using a compiler.
